name: dangeon-crawler
description: Its game. You should crawl dangeon

scripts.build-bin-linux: tsc && npx pkg -d --compress GZip --targets node18-linux-arm64,node18-linux-x64 --out-path bin dist/index.js
scripts.build-bin-macos: tsc && npx pkg -d --compress GZip --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-macos-x64 --out-path bin dist/index.js
scripts.build-bin-win: tsc && npx pkg -d --compress GZip --targets node18-win-arm64,node18-win-x64 --out-path bin dist/index.js

author: kugimiya
